name: Adventures Of Kok
description:
You're Kok, leader of the Ghost squad. After awakening Kok notices that he found himself in an unknown universe. Escape from this place and return to your home world.
- Different locations
- Different enemies
- 36 levels
- Easter eggs
- Russian and English languages

Also game Is available in Steam Greenlight http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/... If you liked the game - vote in Greenlight.

Cards and achievements will be available in Steam version. Also everyone who buys a game on Itch.io will receive a Steam version when the game goes out there.
